description:
Shatora is the leader of the Juunishinshou, the foster-brother of Shiina Yuya, and the real brother of Sakuya: Nozomu. He was killed by Mibu Kyoushirou for learning the Mibu`s deepest secret. He was able to see into the past and was a valuable member of the Mibu Clan because of this ability. He was resurrected by the Mibu Clan, but his body was infused with the soul of Oda Nobunaga. In addition to his ability to see the past, he could resurrect any Juunishinshou that had been beaten and killed making him a very valuable asset. He is killed again by Kyou at his own request.
In the anime Shatora is the sister of Oda Nobunaga, she is in love with her own brother and supports him in his goal of turning the world into "a hell of battles" so they can be together as lovers in the new world. She is a skilled swordswoman and magician, who has the ability to create artificial bodies and transfer human souls, which she uses to revive her brother, first in his tree body and then later in Kyou`s body.
name: Shatora
